body.label: Body Settings
body.help: Set width and background styling of the page body.

fonts.label: Font Settings
fonts.help: Choose the font, colour and size settings used around the site.

inputs.label: Input Settings
inputs.help: Tweak the feel of input and button elements.

buttons.label: Button Settings
buttons.help: Alter the colour of buttons used around the site.

navigation.label: Navigation Settings
navigation.help: Choose the colours used for each level of the category navigation, e.g. link and background colour.

sidebar.label: Sidebar Settings
sidebar.help: Change format of blocks in the sidebar, e.g. background colours, borders etc.

footer.label: Footer Settings
footer.help: In a similar fashion to header settings, configure the footer text and link styling.

body_background_image.label: Body Background Image
body_background_image.help: Upload a image to be used as the background

body_background_position.label: Body Background Image Position

font_family.label: Font Family
